decision_conditions:
This decision confirms the Council's agreement that following alternative wording of condition 2 of permission P2019/2991/S73 is acceptable:

CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved documents and plans:

Planning Statement (dated February 2012),
Cover Letter by DP9 (dated October 2019),
Section 73 Design & Access Statement (Issue 2) dated 29th November 2019;
Drawing Numbers:P100/A, P101, P102/B, P103/B, P104/D, P105/B, P106/C, P107/B,
P108/C, P109/B, P110/B, P111/B, P112/B, P113/B, P114/B, P115/B, P151/C, P152/A,
P161/B, P162/B, P163/A, P164/A, P6001/A, P6002/B, A6003/B,
SK1245 Rev A;
Additional townscape view information 0843F_Doc 057A_issue 01; Roof level design development 0843F_Doc 057_issue 04.
Historic Environment Assessment (dated February 2012),
Charterhouse Place - Heritage Statement by DP9 (dated October 2019),
Transport Assessment by Royal HaskoningDHV (dated September 2019),
Framework Travel Plan by Royal HaskoningDHV (dated September 2019),
Response to TfL by Royal HaskoningDHV (dated December 2019),
Energy Strategy Report (Stage 4) by RES (Issue 8) dated November 2019;
Sustainable Design and Construction Statement (Issue No. 1 dated 16/02/12),
BREEAM New Construction 2018 Assessment Report (dated December 2019),
Thermal Comfort Analysis by RES (dated December 2019),
Drainage Assessment Akt II (dated October 2019),
Acoustic Consultancy Report (dated January 2012),
Charterhouse Place: Pre-application Community Involvement (dated February 2012),
Waste Strategy (dated 22 February 2012),
Interaction with Citigen Power Station Emissions and Air Quality Implications (dated 29 March 2012),
Letters from GIA (dated 29 February 2012 and 25 May 2012),
Daylight and Sunlight Report (dated 21 May 2012),
Letter from Knight Frank dated October 2019,
Area Schedule by Lifschutz, Davidson, Sandilands dated December 2019,
Security Scheme Design Outline Document dated January 2020.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description: Application for Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref: P2019/2991/S73 for erection of 11 storey over basement building comprising 4 Class A1 retail units at ground floor level and Class B1 (office) above, plus ancillary facilities including provision for basement level servicing. The proposed changes involve minor roof level design amendments.
